name: Doomies - Intense 2D Shooter
description:
There's an invasion in our base! How much can you survive?

This is a horde survival game from killing some mutant animals. Very petatestic! you can choose 3 differect characters with different weapons!

The Axolotl character is a reference to my friends Axolotl Bros, they are making awesome games and they helped me so much in my projects, i learned so much thanks to them. please check them out: https://axolotlbrothers.com/

I hope you like the game!

---------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click - Shoot

F4 - Fullscreen

F1 or T - Restart the game
